title: Ingame lags without a high ping
body:
Since last day my game lags every 5 minutes without a high ping.
Before, the game runned normal without any lags etc.
Help

replies.body: I'm really confused about what you mean about lagging without high ping, so I'd like to get more information.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) on the matches these are happening in.  Let me know what results you find, and we can go from there.  If you have any additional information as well about what is happening exactly, it could help a lot!  Let me know.  :D

With laggs i mean that the game freezes every 3 minutes for 3 seconds. In this time, i can´t do anything and when the freez ends, my ping goes up to 1200 and then down to 40. Here´s the log reader: http://www.fotos-hochladen.net/view/notgood2g56awipz42.png 
I think it´s not good...
